name: Rootopia
description:
In this tower defense game, you play as a tree defending against fire enemies. Expand your roots to absorb water and grow new plants to help defend. Only pure roots can absorb water, so use others to defend and attack. Your goal is to reach 5000 liters of water before being defeated. Challenge your strategy skills in this exciting game, originally created for Global Game Jam 2023.

ggj game site : https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/rootopia-8
